name: Code Of Cerulean (action rpg demo)
description:
Synopsis:
Code Of Cerulean is an open world science fantasy action rpg set in a two
dimensional world. The game is a top down / side scroller with no
gravity. There is a good balance of puzzle solving and combat. This
demo includes 3 boss fights, 23 mini puzzle dungeons, 2 main quest
dungeons, and a level editor, This game was created by Taylor
Robinson over a span of ten years.
        
Story:
The story takes place 5 years after the complete destruction of 3D space.
You play as an anthropomorphic shape shifting cat who's creation was
commissioned by the council of cerulean. Upon being created you are
tasked with collecting all 5 fragments of the source code. These will
be used to re-write the underlying code of cerulean in order to
prevent the spread of virus like entities from overrunning the world.
         
Features:
10 years worth of work so far.
Large open world.
5 main quest puzzle dungeons.
8 main quest combat dungeons.
23 mini puzzle dungeons.
630 items. Each containing lore to read.
Nearly 300 weapons.
Collectible books containing lore and short story's.
5 unique player forms. With different abilities.
Mining area for collecting ore, jems, and fossils. ← mostly finished but not in demo.
Crafting menu / hundreds of craft-able items.
Level editor / coming soon → saves as text file for easy sharing.
          
Controls:
WASD = move.
Right mouse = to drag objects / close menu.
Mouse wheel up = hot bar.
Mouse wheel down = menu.
Mouse wheel click = draw weapon.
Left mouse click = talk to people / open doors / use hot-bar items.
R = reset game.
Delete = HACKS! Give yourself 100 extra points in each stat. Haha, just for fun.
When in doubt, use the mouse!
            
Install instructions:
(1) Download the zip file
(2) Unzip the file
(3) Launch "cerulean demo"
